|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-2680 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR2680A1 |icid = 4216A-IR2680A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141911720067J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PXB4395EL;PXB4395EL1600, S7373N11, SLMD9; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 600 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = UniIC;HXB13H4G160AF-13KT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117I |manuf_rev = AC44-DK |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83524M;PSB83524M, S7354L26, SLLQJ; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83514M;PSB83514MV12, S7014L23, SLLVP; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:141911720067J R0B1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] WG9117I AC44-DK (146000168700J R01) [https://fccid.io/KA2IR2680A1/Label/Label-Sample-3837467 Label] <!-- :CPU: S7373N11 SLMD9 :5GHz Wi-Fi: S7354L26 SLLQJ :2.4GHz Wi-Fi: S7014L23 SLLVP -->
*D-Link DIR-2680 - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router Powered by McAfee'' :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4395EL (GRX350); WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV500
{{see also|ASUS Blue Cave|Humax Quantum T9|Phicomm K3C}}
*AC2600 Wi-Fi with MU-MIMO *Gigabit ports (1x WAN, 4x LAN) *Intel GRX350 Network Processor *Cutting-Edge Chip Technology *Comprehensive parental controls *McAfee Secure Home Platform (SHP) *Downloadable antivirus software for devices *Protects all connected devices, including IoT devices *Cloud-based machine learning helps detect threats
==Links of Interest== :[https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-2680-ac2600-wi-fi-router-powered-by-mcafee/ Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/router-powered-by-mcafee/ Press release]
===Announced at CES 2018=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33171-d-link-announces-new-wi-fi-systems-routers-and-cameras-at-ces-2018 ''D-Link Announces New Wi-Fi Systems and Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://betanews.com/2018/01/08/dlink-dir2680-wifi-router-mcafee-intel/ ''D-Link DIR-2680 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''BetaNews'''] *[https://www.ithome.com.tw/review/120871 ''D-Link DIR-2680 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''ITHome'''] (CN)
==See also== *[[D-Link DAP-2680 rev A1|D-Link DAP-2680]] - ''AC1750 Wireless Dual-Band PoE Access Point'' :FCC ID: KA2AP2680A1 (2018-02-27), QCA (Alpha Networks), 12V/2A *[[D-Link COVR-C1203]] - ''AC1200 Dual-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x3 2.4/5GHz, MU-MIMO, Smart Roaming, $250 (Q1 2018) [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2017/33052-d-link-ces-2017-announcements PR] *[[D-Link COVR-2202]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x2 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 5GHz (backhaul), Alexa, $320 (Q2 2018) *[[D-Link DIR-X6060]] - ''AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 6 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port *[[D-Link DIR-X9000]] - ''AX11000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 11 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port :8x high-performance antennas, DLNA, D-Link Wi-Fi App
[[Category:English Documentation]]
